p: Four trials, including 142 cases, investigated the impact of antiviral therapy on HBeAg clearance in HBV-GN patients. We evaluated HBeAg clearance after antiviral therapy, and the heterogeneity using the I 2 statistic was 63%, P = 0.05. The test for the overall effect was P<0.00001 with a random effect model ( Fig 7). HBeAg significantly decreased after antiviral therapy (OR = 27.08, 95% CI: 3.71−197.88). A sensitivity analysis was performed and showed that the study by Tang’s study[ 19] was the main factor impacting the results. ( S5 Fig)
